content: this project is delivered as a very beginner-friendly video tutorial on my brave new hook youtube channel i go nice and slow and i explain each step of the process in full detail make one or more just for the fun of learning some very basic but often-used crochet techniques each hairbrain is * quick and easy to crochet * made all in one piece so no sewing * great idea for random acts of crochet kindness * quick make for market stall * scrap-buster - each uses very little yarn you can make these with just about any yarn you like just make sure you use the appropriate hook for the yarn weight written instructions for the project are included in the video description
